overview:
Marc Kalman is the Founder and Chief Executive Officer of BizSlate.

Previously, Mr. Kalman was co-founder and Chief Executive Officer of eZCom Software Inc., a SaaS Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) provider focused on helping SMBs streamline supply chain operations around EDI relationships. Under his leadership and with little outside capital, eZCom evolved from the ground up into a well-respected, highly competitive company. Mr. Kalman has been recognized as a leading authority in the supply chain space, and has been recognized as one of the top supply chain professionals in the country by Supply and Demand Chain Executive for 3 consecutive years.
